sqlMap.select:
select
,s.ZC_FZR_USER_NAME FROM ZC_EB_ENTRUST E, ( select * from ZC_EB_DUTY_AUDIT_SHEET where 1=1
) S, (SELECT * FROM ZC_EB_PROTOCOL P, (SELECT H.INSTANCE_ID, MAX(TO_DATE(H.EXECUTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')) AS D FROM WF_ACTION H GROUP BY H.INSTANCE_ID) WH WHERE WH.INSTANCE_ID(+) = P.PROCESS_INST_ID) ZC_EB_PROTOCOL WHERE E.SN(+) =ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.SN AND S.SN(+) = ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.SN and S.AGENCY=e.agency
ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.ND = #nd#
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_TODO where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_CURRENT_TASK_ZC_UNTREAD where executor =#executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.process_inst_id)
exists (select instance_id from V_WF_ACTION_HISTORY_GK53 where executor = #executor# and instance_id = ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.process_inst_id) and ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.status!='cancel' and ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.status!='exec'
(ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.status ='exec')
exists (select WF_DRAFT_NAME from as_wf_draft where user_id=#executor# and compo_id=#wfcompoId# and WF_DRAFT_ID=ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.process_inst_id)
e.CO_CODE = #coCode:VARCHAR#
ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.status=#billStatus:VARCHAR#
order by ZC_EB_PROTOCOL.D desc
